title: Quick Tab Cross-Tab Sync v1.6.2.5 Fix
details:
v1.6.2.5 fixes 7 critical sync bugs:

1. **skipDeletions: false for storage.onChanged** - SyncCoordinator.handleStorageChange() now passes skipDeletions: false to hydrate() to trust storage as single source of truth
2. **all_frames: false in manifest** - Content script only runs in top-level pages, not iframes
3. **Iframe guard hardened** - 3 independent checks: CSS selectors, blob: URL check, parent DOM structure
4. **Tab visibility refresh trusts storage** - handleTabVisible() skips merge, uses skipDeletions: false
5. **Improved logging** - StateManager logs changeDetails array with positionChanged/sizeChanged/zIndexChanged per Quick Tab

Key insight: When storage.onChanged fires, storage is authoritative. If Quick Tab not in storage, delete it locally.
